result.reason: The High Contrast theme (VS2005) is currently only activated via system detection. If detection fails (e.g. some Win10/11 high contrast modes), the user is stuck with the default theme which clashes with high contrast colors. Adding the High Contrast theme to the selectable list allows manual override.
result.approach: Update ThemeManager.LoadThemes() to explicitly add HighContrastTheme to the 'themes' collection so it appears in the Options menu dropdown.
